statements: UPDATE city_climate_actions SET responsible_department='Public Works Department', emissions_reduction_goal=15.75 WHERE action_id=1;

UPDATE emission_goals SET goal_description = 'Reduce emissions by 20%' WHERE goal_year = 2022
